Standard.Name: The Singular Case of the Midshipman 1.2.1.1.2

English.Text: The autopsy is sufficient to confirm it was murder. Strangulation was the cause of death, not a slit throat - which was added post-mortem. All else remains unknown. Nevertheless, with the cause of death established, the list of suspects is narrowed down to just a few who had the means and the motive for the crime.
